name: "Heaven And Hell" - Beta
description:
"Heaven And Hell" - Working Title for the Beta Release
Everything in this build, from gameplay feel to visuals is subject to change depending on the release of the game. 

The main control of the game is using the mouse.

  • Left click - Interact
  • Right click - Zoom

In this release of the game, we have one character implemented with SFX and VFX. We'd love to hear feedback for the game and how it feels and please remember that this is all subject to change!

Beta project for Goldsmiths Year 2, Group by Rich, Adewuyi and Olly.
